data.name: test University
data.description:
About Chandigarh University

Amity University, Noida (Amity University Uttar Pradesh) is a private university located in Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India. It was established in 2005 by an Act of the Uttar Pradesh Legislature. The university offers a wide range of programs across engineering, management, law, liberal arts, and more.

Highlights

  • Campus in Sector-125, Noida
  • Recognized by UGC, accredited by NAAC with grade 'A+' :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}
  • International accreditations: WASC, IET for certain programmes :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}
  • Large student body; multiple campuses across India and abroad :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}
  • Strong emphasis on research, innovation and industry collaborations :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}
data.shortDescription: Chandigarh University is a private university in Noida, India, offering diverse professional and non-professional programs with international accreditation and strong research focus.

financialAid.title: Financial Aid & Scholarships
financialAid.description: fincial aid upto 60 % based on merit

advantages.description: Amity University holds the prestigious NAAC A+ grade, reflecting our commitment to academic excellence, quality infrastructure, and overall institutional performance. This accreditation ensures students receive education that meets the highest national standards.

Sprawling eco-friendly campus spread across 1000+ acres featuring state-of-the-art infrastructure, smart classrooms, advanced laboratories, modern libraries, sports complexes, and dedicated zones for academics, recreation, and residential facilities.

Outstanding placement record with 95%+ students placed annually. Highest package of ₹64 LPA and average package of ₹6.8 LPA. Over 5000+ companies including Google, Microsoft, Amazon, Deloitte, and top MNCs recruit from campus.

faqs.question: What is the admission process for Amity University?
faqs.answer: Admission process varies by program. For UG programs, candidates need to qualify in Amity JEE or accept JEE Main scores. For PG programs, candidates need to appear for Amity entrance exam or have valid GATE/CAT scores. Application can be done online through the official website.

faqs.question: Does Amity University provide scholarships?
faqs.answer: Yes, Amity offers multiple scholarship programs including merit-based scholarships (up to 100% tuition waiver), need-based scholarships, sports scholarships, and scholarships for children of armed forces personnel.

faqs.question: What is the placement record of Amity University?
faqs.answer: Amity has an excellent placement record with 95%+ placement rate. The highest package offered is ₹64 LPA and average package is ₹6.8 LPA. Over 5000 companies including Google, Microsoft, Amazon, Deloitte recruit from campus.

faqs.question: Are hostel facilities available?
faqs.answer: Yes, Amity provides separate hostel facilities for boys and girls with modern amenities including Wi-Fi, mess, laundry, gym, recreation room, and 24/7 security. Hostel rooms are available in single, double, and triple occupancy.

faqs.question: Does Amity have international collaborations?
faqs.answer: Yes, Amity has partnerships with 200+ universities worldwide offering student exchange programs, dual degree programs, international internships, and study abroad opportunities.

seo.metaDescription: test University Noida offers 300+ programs with 95%+ placement rate.

programs.eligibilityCriteria: Minimum 50% in 10+2 in any stream. Admission is based on the university's entrance test and interview.
programs.admissionProcess: Based on performance in the university's entrance test, followed by an English language test and a personal interview.

program.name: BBA
program.description:
Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)

BBA is a three-year undergraduate program that provides foundational knowledge in business management, preparing students for leadership roles in various industries.

Program Features

  • Holistic business education
  • Case study methodology
  • Industry internships
  • Soft skills development
  • Entrepreneurship support

Specializations Available

  • Finance & Accounting
  • Marketing Management
  • Human Resource Management
  • International Business
  • Operations Management
  • Business Analytics

Career Paths

Management Trainee, Business Analyst, Marketing Executive, HR Executive, Financial Analyst, Entrepreneur

"
program.shortDescription: Comprehensive undergraduate business program covering management, finance, marketing, and entrepreneurship fundamentals.
program.standardEligibility:
Minimum Qualification: 10+2 in any stream

\n

Minimum Percentage: 50% in 12th

\n

Required Exams: University Entrance Test / Merit-based
program.standardCurriculum:
Core Subjects

  • Principles of Management
  • Financial Accounting
  • Business Economics
  • Marketing Management
  • Human Resource Management
  • Operations Management
  • Business Law
  • Organizational Behavior
  • Business Communication
  • Entrepreneurship Development

programs.eligibilityCriteria: Minimum 60% in 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics. JEE Main / State CET / Amity JEE scores required
programs.admissionProcess: Based on national/state level entrance exam scores or Amity JEE, followed by a personal interview.

program.name: Btech
program.description:
B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering

Our B.Tech CSE program is designed to provide students with a strong foundation in computer science principles and practical skills needed for the modern tech industry.

Program Highlights

  • Comprehensive curriculum covering core CS concepts
  • Hands-on labs and practical projects
  • Industry-relevant specializations
  • Internship opportunities with top tech companies
  • Placement assistance and career guidance

Key Areas of Study

  • Programming Languages (C, C++, Java, Python)
  • Data Structures & Algorithms
  • Database Management Systems
  • Computer Networks
  • Operating Systems
  • Software Engineering
  • Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
  • Web Development
  • Mobile App Development
  • Cybersecurity

Career Opportunities

Graduates can work as Software Engineers, Data Scientists, System Architects, DevOps Engineers, Full-Stack Developers, and more in leading tech companies.
program.shortDescription: Comprehensive undergraduate program in computer science covering programming, algorithms, data structures, AI, and software engineering.
program.standardEligibility:
Minimum Qualification: 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics

Minimum Percentage: 60% in PCM

Required Exams: JEE Main / State CET / University Entrance Exam

Age Limit: No age limit
program.standardCurriculum:
Semester-wise Curriculum

Year 1

  • Engineering Mathematics-I & II
  • Engineering Physics & Chemistry
  • Programming for Problem Solving (C)
  • Introduction to Computer Science
  • Digital Logic Design
  • Communication Skills

Year 2

  • Data Structures
  • Object-Oriented Programming (Java)
  • Computer Organization & Architecture
  • Discrete Mathematics
  • Database Management Systems
  • Operating Systems

Year 3

  • Design & Analysis of Algorithms
  • Computer Networks
  • Software Engineering
  • Theory of Computation
  • Web Technologies
  • Elective Subjects (AI/ML, Cloud Computing, etc.)

Year 4

  • Compiler Design
  • Cryptography & Network Security
  • Specialization Electives
  • Major Project
  • Industry Internship

approvals.name: ACU
approvals.description: The ACU is an international association dedicated to supporting and strengthening cooperation among its member universities across the Commonwealth. It promotes higher education as a force for good.

approvals.name: AICTE
approvals.fullName: All India Council for Technical Education
approvals.description: AICTE is the statutory body for proper planning and coordinated development of technical education and management education system throughout India. Approval is mandatory for technical courses like B.Tech and MBA.

approvals.name: UGC
approvals.description: UGC is the statutory body in India responsible for determining and maintaining standards of university education. It provides grants to universities and maintains overall quality control.

approvals.name: NAAC
approvals.description: NAAC is an autonomous body that assesses and accredits Higher Education Institutions (HEIs) in India based on criteria like curriculum, research, and teaching quality. Provides grades like A++, A+, A, etc.

approvals.name: WES
approvals.description: A non-profit organization that provides credential evaluations for international students and immigrants seeking to study or work in the U.S. or Canada. WES evaluation helps foreign degrees gain recognition.

approvals.name: ICAS
approvals.fullName: International Credential Assessment Service of Canada
approvals.description: A credential evaluation service providing assessment reports for educational credentials earned outside of Canada, often used for employment, professional licensing, and academic purposes in Canada.
